Measure the length of PICC catheter.sentence: The nurse prepares the measuring tape for accurate measurement.
Measure the length of PICC catheter.subject: The nurse

Measure the length of PICC catheter.sentence: The nurse positions the patient’s arm to ensure the catheter is straight.
Measure the length of PICC catheter.subject: The nurse

Measure the length of PICC catheter.sentence: The nurse aligns the measuring tape with the PICC catheter's tip and the insertion site.
Measure the length of PICC catheter.subject: The nurse

Measure the length of PICC catheter.sentence: The nurse reads the measurement from the tape to determine the catheter length.
Measure the length of PICC catheter.subject: The nurse

Measure the length of PICC catheter.sentence: The nurse documents the catheter length in the patient's medical record.
Measure the length of PICC catheter.subject: The nurse
